summary: Gregory "Greg" Kinnear  is an American movie, voice, and television actor.
full_text:
Gregory Buck "Greg" Kinnear  is an American actor and television personality. He was nominated for an Academy Award for his role in As Good as It Gets.
Kinnear appeared in films, such as Sabrina, You've Got Mail, Nurse Betty, We Were Soldiers, Little Miss Sunshine, Invincible and Green Zone, and in television roles, such as Friends, Talk Soup, The Kennedys, Modern Family and Rake.
^ 20 Other Stuff You Might Want to Know . Stason.org. Retrieved on 2014-06-05.
title: Greg Kinnear
